document.full_text: two muslim scholars headed to a conference on american fears of islam were pulled from a morning flight on friday, and were later told that the pilot had refused to fly with them aboard.
document.title: muslim scholars pulled from delta plane in memphis
lines_and_colors: two muslim scholars headed to a conference on american fears of islam were pulled from a morning flight on friday, and were later told that the pilot had refused to fly with them aboard.
